channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Stock in & out
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Stock in & out

item.title: CVE-2021-24520|2024-08-03T19:35:19.820Z -- unknown -- stock%20in%20%26%20out
item.description: The Stock in & out WordPress plugin through 1.0.4 lacks proper sanitization before passing variables to an SQL request, making it vulnerable to SQL Injection attacks. Users with a role of contributor or higher can exploit this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2021-24346|2024-08-03T19:28:23.463Z -- unknown -- stock%20in%20%26%20out
item.description: The Stock in & out WordPress plugin through 1.0.4 has a search functionality, the lowest accessible level to it being contributor. The srch POST parameter is not validated, sanitised or escaped before using it in the echo statement, leading to a reflected XSS issue
